component.description: Slider is used to provide input with various customization options like orientation, display modes and skinning.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
for false java.lang.String Id of the input text that the slider will be used for.
display false java.lang.String Id of the component to display the slider value.
minValue false java.lang.Double 0.0 Minimum value of the slider. Default is 0.0.
maxValue false java.lang.Double 100.0 Maximum value of the slider. Default is 100.0.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the container element.
animate false java.lang.Boolean true Boolean value to enable/disable the animated move when background of slider is clicked. Default is true.
type false java.lang.String horizontal Sets the type of the slider, "horizontal" or "vertical". Default is horizontal.
step false java.lang.Double 1.0 Fixed pixel increments that the slider move in. Default is 1.0.
disabled false java.lang.Boolean false Disables or enables the slider.
onSlideStart false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when slide begins.
onSlide false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute during sliding.
onSlideEnd false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when slide ends.
range false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, two handles are provided for selecting a range.
displayTemplate false java.lang.String String template to use when updating the display. Valid placeholders are {value}, {min} and {max}.
